long_description: For cross-country riders who want a capable, race-ready bike for any terrain, the full-suspension Cannondale Rush 29 2 mountain bike offers balanced front and rear suspension for climbs and descents. Rush aluminum frame with sloping top tube creates a generous stand-over height and saves weight by using less material and fewer weld joints. RockShox XC30 suspension fork offers 100mm of bump-busting travel; you'll be ready to take on highly technical trails. X-Fusion 02 RL rear shock is designed with performance and durability in mind; staged travel improves efficiency and bump control. Shimano Alivio/Deore Shadow derailleurs give you easy mastery of the 27-speed drivetrain as you travel through changing terrain. Shimano cranks dish out tough, easy-spinning power. Shimano MM15 hydraulic disc brakes provide quick braking power. Maddux Disc rims are laced up to Formula hubs and outfitted with WTB NineLine tires for sure traction. Platform pedals mean no special bike shoes are required. Specs on the Cannondale Rush 29 2 mountain bike are subject to change.
